name: Adventure travel & hiking – Atlantic islands and Balkans
summary: Enjoys island landscapes (Madeira, Azores) and mountain hikes in the Balkans (Kopaonik/Devojački grob), plus urban exploration in cities like Istanbul and Porto.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/instagram.md – 'Fanal Mountain Madeira … Witchcraft place indeed' and multiple 'Madeira Island' posts incl. 'Carnival in Madeira'
/inputs/instagram.md – 'São Miguel Island … Gorgeous, astonishing… majestic' + 'Caldeira Velha' + 'Boys do hiking'
/inputs/instagram.md – 'Istanbul, Turkey – Город котиков'; 'Porto, Portugal – Awesome Porto at night'

name: Historical remembrance tourism & national museums
summary: Seeks out places of memory and history museums in Eastern Europe, reflecting deeply on Holocaust history.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/instagram.md – 'Auschwitz-Birkenau … посмотрел документалку … Поэтому давайте не забывать…'

name: High‑energy electronic club culture (hard techno, DnB, trance)
summary: Gravitates to aggressive BPM and rave edits alongside classic DnB and progressive trance; likely enjoys club/festival energy.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/music.md – 'This Is Technometal' (Paolo Ferrara & Lorenzo Raganzini); '5 Mins Of Acid' (KI/KI); 'Push Up' (Creeds); 'Hardtekk' edits

/inputs/music.md – DnB/trance picks: 'Beautiful Lies (VIP)' (B‑Complex); 'Chase The Sun' (Koven); 'Nothing to Hide' (Cosmic Gate & Diana Miro); 'Lose This Feeling (Dimension Remix)' (Armin van Buuren)

name: CIS hip‑hop & post‑Soviet street rap
summary: Frequent listens to Скриптонит, Oxxxymiron, Miyagi & Andy Panda, Каста, Gio Pika, Ulukmanapo and adjacent artists indicate strong affinity for CIS rap scenes.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/music.md – 'Москва любит…', 'Я не улыбаюсь' (Скриптонит); 'Город под подошвой'/'Тентакли' (Oxxxymiron); 'Brooklyn' (Miyagi & Andy Panda); 'Вокруг шум' (Каста); multiple Gio Pika & Ulukmanapo tracks

name: 2000s alt/nu‑metal nostalgia + darkwave/synth aesthetics
summary: Balances heavy 2000s alt‑metal/nu‑metal with moody darkwave/synth and indie electronic—suggesting a taste for emotive, atmospheric sounds.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/music.md – Korn, System of a Down, Deftones, Breaking Benjamin, Godsmack, Mudvayne, Papa Roach, Bring Me The Horizon
/inputs/music.md – Mr.Kitty ('After Dark'), Mareux ('The Perfect Girl'), Emika, Röyksopp, Crystal Castles, The xx

name: Retro Eurodance/Italo nostalgia
summary: Occasional throwbacks to 80s–00s Eurodance/Italo and meme remixes (C.C. Catch, Mo-Do, ATC, Laura Branigan) for light, nostalgic energy.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/music.md – 'Cause You Are Young' (C.C. Catch); 'Eins Zwei Polizei' (Mo‑Do); 'Around the World' (ATC); 'Self Control' (Laura Branigan)

name: Historiography & critical film analysis
summary: Regularly watches historical film deconstructions and lectures (Клим Жуков; 'Деконструкция'), indicating interest in how history is represented in media.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/youtube.md – 'Деконструкция. Клим Жуков о … «Крестоносцы», «Огнём и мечом», «Клеопатра», «Храброе сердце», «Король»' and armor/history videos

name: Science communication – human origins, linguistics, astronomy
summary: Follows accessible science channels on anthropology, language history, and space, favoring long-form explainers.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/youtube.md – НаучДок, Дробышевский, 'Космос Просто', 'Virginia Bēowulf · English Studies'

name: Contemporary conflict commentary & military history
summary: Consumes multiple channels analyzing current conflicts and military history (разные точки зрения), suggesting ongoing interest in geopolitics.

evidence.snippet: /inputs/youtube.md – Анатолий Шарий (series of videos), HistoryLegends, Willy OAM, 'Easy History' Gulf War explainer

name: Urbanism & travel documentaries
summary: Enjoys deep-dives into cities, infrastructure, safety and architecture worldwide (Varlamov Travel, Arkadiy Gershman).

evidence.snippet: /inputs/youtube.md – Varlamov Travel on Harare, Phuket, Bangkok, Australia, South Korea; Arkadiy Gershman on suburbs

name: CRPGs & classic strategy communities
summary: Active interest in Baldur’s Gate 3 guides/exploits and the enduring Heroes of Might and Magic III scene (guides, streams, community content).

evidence.snippet: /inputs/youtube.md – 'How Quickly Can You Become a Millionaire in BG3?', BG3 shorts/guides; 'Герои III … как играть?' guides/streams, 'Jebus Outcast'
